Package com.Akif

Class Data

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.Data
public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
This class keeps all data regarding the system in a data structure that implement search tree interface. It also operate the data. We wrote this class for reusable purpose, we will use this operations later.

    One parameter constructor to initialize fields.

    • getSoftware

      public Software getSoftware​(Software target)
      Returns given software if it is in data structure.
      Parameters:
      target - The item being sought
      Returns:
      given software if it is in data structure. If not found null is returned.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true If the item is in the tree, false otherwise
